name: Release 0.11.1
body: Fixed a bug in the command line when no sub-command is specified.

name: Release 0.11.0
body: Reduced memory footprint and processing speed. The modules ``lsb`` and ``lsbset`` have been merged ([PR #34](https://github.com/cedricbonhomme/Stegano/pull/34)).

name: v0.10.1
body:
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cedricbonhomme/Stegano/compare/v0.10.0...v0.10.1

For more details see the project page: https://sr.ht/~cedric/stegano

name: Release version 0.10.0 of Stegano
body:
## What's Changed
* Update index.rst by @kapkic in https://github.com/cedricbonhomme/Stegano/pull/31
* added: shi-tomashi corner generator by @thundersparkf in https://github.com/cedricbonhomme/Stegano/pull/32

## New Contributors
* @kapkic made their first contribution in https://github.com/cedricbonhomme/Stegano/pull/31
* @thundersparkf made their first contribution in https://github.com/cedricbonhomme/Stegano/pull/32

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cedricbonhomme/Stegano/compare/v0.9.9...v0.10.0

For more details see the project page: https://sr.ht/~cedric/stegano

name: Release 0.9.9
body: * Stegano now uses Pillow 8.3.0.

name: Release 0.9.4
body:
* new: Implemented LFSR generator (with tests and CLI) ([PR #27](https://github.com/cedricbonhomme/Stegano/pull/27))
* new: Implemented Ackermann generators CLI interface ([PR #26](https://github.com/cedricbonhomme/Stegano/pull/26))
* new: The Ackermann functions are not actual generators ([#24](https://github.com/cedricbonhomme/Stegano/issues/24))
* new: add a shift parameter for the lsbmodule ([#25](https://github.com/cedricbonhomme/Stegano/issues/25))
* fix: lsbset.hide cause .png transparent area lost ([#23](https://github.com/cedricbonhomme/Stegano/issues/23))

name: Release 0.9.3
Release 0.9.2
body:
* updated Pillow dependency to version 6.0.0 in order to fix a bug when opening
  some PNG files (https://github.com/python-pillow/Pillow/issues/3557).

name: Release 0.9.1
body: - updated Pillow dependency in order to fix a bug when opening some PNG files.

name: Release 0.9.0
body: * added the possibility to shift the encoded bits when using the lsbset module.

name: Release 0.8.6
body: * fixed a potential security issue related to CVE-2018-18074.

name: Release 0.8.5
body:
* Fixed an encoding problem which occurred on Windows during the installation
  of the module.

name: Release 0.8.4
body: Stegano is ready for use with pipenv and pipsi.

name: Release 0.8.3
body: The recommended way to install Stegano is now to use pipenv.

name: Release 0.8.2
body:
* Fixed a bug with the new 'encoding' function when using Stegano as a command
  line tool. No default value was set. Default value is UTF-8.

name: Release 0.8.1
Release 0.8
Release 0.7.1
Release 0.7
body:
* unicode is now supported. By default UTF-8 encoding is used. UTF-32LE can also
  be used to hide non-ASCII characters. UTF-8 (8 bits) is the default choice
  since it is possible to hide longer messages with it.
* improved checks with type hints.

name: Release 0.6.9
Release 0.6.8
body: - bugfix: fixed #12: Error when revealing a hidden binary file in an image.

name: Release 0.6.7
body: - bugfix: added missing dependency in the setup.py file.

name: Release 0.6.6
body:
- improved docstrings for the desciption of the generators;
- improved the command which displays the list of generators.

name: Release 0.6.5
body:
- added a command to list all available generators for the lsb-set module;
- test when the data image is coming via byte stream, for the lsb module.

name: Release 0.6.4
body:
- a command line for the 'red' module has been added;
- bugfix: fixed a bug in the lsb-set command line when the generator wasn't specified by the user.

name: Release 0.6.3
body: Support for transparent PNG images has been added (lsb and lsbset modules).

name: Release 0.6.2
body: Bugfix: solved a bug when the image data is coming via byte streams (ByteIO), for the exifHeader hiding method.

name: Release 0.6.1
body: Reorganization of the steganalysis sub-module.

name: Release 0.6
body:
- improvements of the command line of Stéganô. The use of Stéganô through the
  command line has slightly changed ('hide' and 'reveal' are now sub-parameters
  of the command line). No changes if you use Stéganô as a module in your
  software. The documentation has been updated accordingly.

name: Release 0.5.5
body: - bugfix: Incorrect padding size in `base642string` in tools.base642binary().

name: Release 0.5.4
body:
- the generator provided to the functions lsbset.hide() and lsbset.reveal() is
  now a function. This is more convenient for a user who wants to use a custom
  generator (not in the module lsbset.generators).
- performance improvements for the lsb and lsbset modules.

name: Release 0.5.3
body: Reorganization of all modules. No impact for the users of Stegano.

name: Release 0.5.2
